page.title: 15The Pentewan road
page.content: On the way to Pentewan beach there is a very bendy road but very long.On the way there are a few houses and lots of trees all diferent colours and sizes. The types of trees that are along the road are: oak trees,fir trees and all kinds of others. There are four holiday camps (including Pentewan holiday camp) along the road.Also along the road there is a sign that leads to Polgooth and on the other side there is a public house and three houses and when I go past them there are three cars because of the houses. On the way to Pentewan we have to go through a very dark spot where the trees are arched over the road and we pass near London Apprentice.
